metadata.title: CVE-2023-47038 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A vulnerability was found in perl. This issue occurs when a crafted regularexpression is compiled by perl, which can allow an attacker controlled bytebuffer overflow in a heap allocated buffer.

criterions.comment: perl: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
perl6: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
